source.name: EPA's Energy Where You Live Website
source.description: Energy use is a part of everyone's daily routine. However, the generation and use of energy can affect the environment. Our regulatory and voluntary programs foster more responsible production and use of energy resources. Each EPA Regional Office is responsible for the execution of the Agency's programs within its states. This website's map and listing of Regional Offices provides access to your region's energy related EPA programs and websites.
